projects.name: Seattle Fire Dispatch
projects.short: A dashboard designed to show current and historical data about the Seattle Fire Dispatch.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.short: My personal portfolio and personal website! If you are reading this you are on my website!

projects.name: Used Car Analysis
projects.short: Exploratory data analysis on the used car market generated from postings on Craigslist.

photos.caption: The number of used cars for sale on Craigslist by color.
A map showing the mean milage of a car sold on Craigslist by state.
A histogram the percent of cars sold on Craigslist by their year.

projects.name: Notakto
projects.short: A terminal game of Notakto, a variant of tick-tac-toe, with 3 levels of AIs to play against.

projects.name: Mouse Listener
projects.short: A quick demo of how to track a mouse in Java for a friend.

projects.name: Blackjack
projects.short: A terminal game of Blackjack writen in Java with an AI dealer and ASCII art.

projects.name: Vending Machine
projects.short: A terminal based vending machine written in C with virtual snacks and prices.

projects.name: Voronoi Diagram Art
projects.short: Code and a poster showing how Voronoi Diagrams could be used to create mosaic like art.

projects.name: Category Theory
projects.short: A brief introduction to category theory created for my real analysis course.

projects.name: Neolithic Transition
projects.short: Researched and modeled the spread of agriculture throughout Europe.

projects.name: Vapor-to-Particle Reactions
projects.short: A compilation of code and posters created while researching chemical reactions.

projects.name: Van der Waerden
projects.short: Conducted research and developed a SAT Solver to improve known for Van der Waerden bounds.

projects.name: Powerline Communication
projects.short: A poster showing the mathematics of how powerlines could be used to communicate long distances.

projects.name: Singular Value Decomposition
projects.short: A poster giving a brief introduction to what singular value decomposition is, how it was derived, and how it can be used.

projects.name: One-Cut Origami
projects.short: A poster explaining the fold-and-cut theorem as well as the maths surrounding origami.

projects.name: A New Way to Knit
projects.short: A presentation and coding project on how to recreate an image using a single piece of thread and a few anchor points.

projects.name: Laplacian Smoothing
projects.short: A poster explaining the algorithm of laplacian smoothing on a mesh.

projects.name: Flappy Bird AI
projects.short: A hand written Q-learning algorithm to teach Flappy bird how get past all those pipes.

projects.name: Double Pendulum
projects.short: A physics simulation of a two double pendulum with minor differences using the Runge-Kutta method.

projects.name: Birthday Paradox
projects.short: A poster and monte carlo simulation to explain the probability of two people have matching birthdays in a group of people.

projects.name: Buffon's Needle Drop
projects.short: A poster and  monte carlo simulation to show how dropping a needle can approximate pi.

projects.name: Grind, Level Design
projects.short: Created a multiplayer Counter Strike map with Konstantin Loffler and Cory De La Torre.

projects.name: Graph Theory
projects.short: Researched graph theory and developed a technique to answer a wide range of combinatorial questions.

projects.name: ODE Technical Manual
projects.short: Wrote a study manual and problem sets going over Ordinary Differential Equals and techniques to solve them

projects.name: 8 bit Arithmetic Logic Unit
projects.short: Designed and built a digital circuit to do basic math functions for my electrical engineering course.

projects.name: De Bruijn
projects.short: Research and developed algorithms to find de Bruijn graphs, sequences, and extensions

projects.name: Online Sprinkler Control System
projects.short: Built an Arduino system to control and schedule sprinklers from a web application.
